title_sort: walt whitman to mr. and mrs. damon y. kilgore, 24 january 1877
title: Walt Whitman to Mr. and Mrs. Damon Y. Kilgore, 24 January 1877

person.name: Mr. and Mrs. Damon Y. Kilgore

recipient.name: Kilgore, Mr. and Mrs. Damon Y.

people: Mr. and Mrs. Damon Y. Kilgore
text: JanJanuary 24 '77My dear Damon Kilgore | & Mrs KilgoreI will be at the Commemorative meeting. I would like to speak from ten to twenty minutes before Mr Phillips's address. What I have to offer might be called A true Reminiscence of Thomas Paine. I shall be to-morrow evening & night, and all Friday, & the following night & forenoon, at 1929 north 22d street, PhilaPhiladelphia. (north of Berks)—& if it would be convenient for you to send a carriage there for me at about 1½ p m Sunday it would suit me—Call on or address me there Friday forenoon or evening, or Saturday forenoon before 12—Walt WhitmanThanks for the hospitality—hearty thanks—I will accept if I can Sunday—but it is not certain— Walt Whitman to Mr. and Mrs. Damon Y. Kilgore, 24 January 1877
